title: N172 Old Judge King Kelly and Buck Ewing For Sale

posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge King Kelly and Buck Ewing For Sale
posts.post_content:
King Kelly SOLD

Buck Ewing Decided to Keep

I’m not a 19th Century collector nor have any skin in the game, but please allow me to state unequivocally that these two cards are exquisite!

GLWS,
Scott

[quote name="Scocs" post=2277305]Please allow me to state unequivocally that these two cards are exquisite![/QUOTE]

Ditto.  

As an aside, Brian is great to work with for those who haven't had the opportunity to do so.

these are the nicest looking OJ I think I've ever seen. Have they been living in a safe for the last 100 yrs?

Sent from my SM-G9900 using Tapatalk

Thanks for the kind words! 

Kelly is sold. Ewing still available.
